plot: The misfortune of one young man, over the course of a day, who manages to find luck in the most unexpected way. There's only one problem - he is human.
title: Magica
plot_es: The misfortune of one young man, over the course of a day, who manages to find luck in the most unexpected way. There's only one problem - he is human.
plot_en: The misfortune of one young man, over the course of a day, who manages to find luck in the most unexpected way. There's only one problem - he is human.
